Say we received the Cipher Text (C) as (21698323120385586424573862118808098555103084743518277473544693629498197679429)  
and we know the Public Key (E,N) of the sender (65537, 84692954109552769374106613978990493265631425360379150170786955314741169348953)
So the variables are -

C = 21698323120385586424573862118808098555103084743518277473544693629498197679429
E = 65537
N = 84692954109552769374106613978990493265631425360379150170786955314741169348953

Can we decipher the cipher text?
